column5: hello all just wondering if there operating as i am having a hard time finding a contact number.i know a few have changed hands but am unable to locate info.jamie

There are definitely a couple operators down there, as I was asking around while I visited in the summer.  All I can remember right now is the local bait & tackle guy -- Rotten Ronnie.  This link should work:  http://web.kwic.com/serranno/  If that doesn't work, you can find him on Google "Rotten Ronnies + Long Point".  When I stopped in and talked to him, he had all the angles on who to go to for huts, and where to fish. Good luck!
Jamie try this I hope it comes up as a link  http://www.longpoint.on.ca/forum/topic.asp?TOPIC_ID=8220
Shermans 519-586-7632 and Akers 519-586-2212 Go with akers they are usually on the perch. Last weekend looked like a city but not many big perch being caught
Also does anyone know if anyone there is running a taxi service this year?
Check Grangers too 519-586-7510. I believe they are running people out to the huts on their sleds.
hello all thanks for the info help cheers jamie
